text:
Karat | Seattle | Remote | Expert Interviewer

Karat has created a network of the world's best software engineers who have a passion for technical interviewing and want to perform interviews on a freelance basis. Make your own schedule, work as much or as little as you'd like, and get paid to interview.

Learn More / Apply Here: https://jobs.lever.co/karat/d44ab283-c7c0-4bbd-b8c3-4dc0ced6...
